name: Feature Request
about: Propose an enhancement or new capability
labels: enhancement
assignees: kevanbtc
---

## Problem / Opportunity
Describe the pain point or opportunity.

## Proposed Solution
High-level description of the feature.

## Value / Impact
- Business value
- User impact
- Risk reduction / ops improvement

## Technical Sketch
Outline components touched (services, contracts, infra).

## Alternatives Considered
Brief notes on other approaches.

## Dependencies
List any external or internal dependencies.

## Rollout / Migration
Phased rollout plan, migration steps.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Clear measurable outcome #1
- [ ] Clear measurable outcome #2

## Additional Context
Links, diagrams, references.
